When I import, I only import the EJB jars in my archive as projects. Everything else (WARs and Application Client modules/utility jars) are imported as binaries and not as projects. I will attach the EAR file.

Created an attachment (id=36685)
Test EAR

Import only the following as projects. Everything else should be left as binaries:

BankCMRQLEJB_EJB
FindAccounts
GetAccounts
TransferJMSClient
WebSphereBank
